p: The distribution of respiratory viruses differed between the Peds‐ED and the cohort (restricted to children and teenagers) (Figure 1, pie charts 1 and 2), with HRV and coronaviruses making up 76% of total positives in the cohort and 47% in the Peds‐ED. Conversely, influenza and HMPV were, respectively, 23% and 8% of hospital data, but only 6% and 4% of the cohort.
